hint.adjust: Try adjusting your filters to find what you're looking for

folder.moveTemplates: All templates in this folder will be moved to the root folder.

validation.titleLength: Title must be at most 100 characters
validation.descriptionLength: Description must be at most 1000 characters

tooltips.dragAndDrop: Drag-n-drop to move, Click - to open menu

hiddenText.title: Hidden Text
hiddenText.hint: Text field that students need to reveal by typing the correct answer or drag and drop an answer from "Draggable Answers" if the section is added to the task.

draggableAnswers.title: Draggable Answers
draggableAnswers.hint: Panel with randomly shuffled answers that students can drag and drop to a 'Hidden Text' field. You can pin the panel to make it visible while scrolling the page.

multipleChoice.title: Multiple Choice
multipleChoice.hint: Drop-down list with multiple options where students need to select the only one correct answer.

sortingOrdering.title: Sorting & Ordering Section
sortingOrdering.hint: Panel with cards that students can reorder. Can be vertical (for sentences) or horizontal (for words or letters).

studentsSection.title: Student Section
studentsSection.hint: Interactive section where students can write any text, record voice, attach images. Teacher can highlight text, and comment on the student's answers.

image.title: Image
image.hint: Upload, crop and insert an image into your task. You can select a file on your device, drag and drop file, or paste an image from clipboard in the editor.

audio.title: Audio
audio.hint: Add an audio that students can play directly in the task. You can select a file on your device or record your own voice.

embed.title: Embed Content
embed.hint: Add external web content in your task: YouTube, Wordwall, Google Docs, or any other website that supports iframe.

checklist.title: Checkbox List
checklist.hint: A list with multiple answer options where students can select one or more correct answers by checking the boxes.

help.title: The same set of elements is available on the editor toolbar. You can combine different mechanics within a single task

onboarding.intro: Let’s get to know the platform

createTasks.title: Create a Task
createTasks.description: Try how easy it is to create tasks
createTasks.hint: You can create tasks with text, images, audio, and other interactive elements. In a single task, you can combine different mechanics: text input, multiple-choice selection, drag-and-drop, and more. Our AI assistant speeds up the task creation process.

createTemplate.title: Create a Work Template
createTemplate.description: A template is a way to combine several tasks into a standard assignment
createTemplate.hint: You can quickly assign it to students without selecting individual tasks. Before sending, the template can be modified for a specific student

inviteStudents.title: Invite a Student
inviteStudents.description: Create a contract with a student
inviteStudents.hint: You can invite as many students as you want. For each student, you will see a separate contract with terms and interaction history

assignWorks.title: Assign Works to Student
assignWorks.hint: Select a student and add previously created tasks to the assignment or create new ones. You can mark the lesson as completed immediately. The student will receive a notification in Telegram about the new assignment and the number of remaining lessons.

manageBalance.title: Manage Student Balance
manageBalance.hint: You can add & deduct lessons from the student's balance for transparent accounting. You and students can find all operations in the "Transactions" section.

onboarding.intro_video: Watch a short video with a demo
onboarding.intro_resize: It's more convenient for the teacher to work on a computer or tablet. Please maximize the application window to full screen.
onboarding.intro_tg: If you're not comfortable working inside Telegram, you can use the platform through the website
onboarding.completed: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the express training and can now use the platform independently.
onboarding.justInCase: There is an “Instruction” section in the menu — if you forget something, you can refer to it.

feedback.title: How would you rate this work?
feedback.placeholder: Share your thoughts about this work...

error.loadFailed: Failed to load work data. Please try again.

teacherFeedback.title: Teacher Feedback

ai.error: Failed to get AI response. Please try again.
ai.messageInputPlaceholder: Type your message here or paste an image to convert it to text...

ai.helpImprove: Ask to improve the task, for example: Add interactive elements

existingContract.title: Contract Already Exists
existingContract.message: You can have only one active contract with a student. Please edit the existing contract instead of creating a new one.

archive.title: Archive Contract
archive.message: Are you sure you want to archive this contract? This action rejects the contract, but the teacher will still be able to offer you a new contract.

reject.title: Reject and Block Teacher
reject.message: Are you sure you want to reject and block this teacher forever? This action will Block the teacher to prevent future contract offers from him.
